tldr: Affected versions of the package may expose sensitive information. A bug in the SQL obfuscation helper, intended for use in database adapter instrumentation, causes the obfuscation to fail when the length of the SQL statement exceeds the obfuscation limit. This results in sensitive data being exposed.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `opentelemetry-helpers-sql-obfuscation` library to the patch version.
